name: Waiting on the World
description:
Waiting on the World
By QueenEarth and Sketchygg

A watched cake never bakes
Neighbors turn on window lights
Art and life pass by
The sun goes to sleep 
Between the heavens

This collab was inspired by the lofi instrumentals that filled our home during the pandemic. The ones that inspired the art and instrumentals we share in the metaverse. 

Featuring the instrumental “Slow Down Craig” by QueenEarth

Written by M Smith
Recorded and Mixed by QueenEarth
All vocals by QueenEarth
Composed and arranged by QueenEarth
Bass and vocal percussion by QueenEarth
Artwork by Sketchygg
Animation by QueenEarth
